text: [Chapter 18a] [PSA Conventions Zone, Central Nolavillia]

speaker: left
text: It seems we must go through this Xuirist camp to proceed.

speaker: left
text: Prepare for battle!

speaker: left
text: Xuirfth, is that you?

speaker: right
text: Xuirventh?

speaker: left
text: These Bipolains helped me take down the camp.

speaker: left
text: And they're being lead by Xuirond.

speaker: left
text: Hello, you must be the other Proto-Xuir.

speaker: left
text: I am Proto-Xuir G3 N2 and my name is Proton Xurr, though it seems like you two call me "Xuirond".

speaker: right
text: How are you alive? Everyone at the Shadow Realm said that you were killed by a teleporter.

speaker: left
text: The teleporter that Scien and I used was broken, but we were lucky enough to be teleported onto the Bipole Continent.

speaker: right
text: We should get going. If Xuirurth has avoided being captured, he should be at the Shadow Alter in the Nation of Nation.

speaker: left
text: Yes, let's get going.
[Xuirfth joins your party]
[Xuirist Cavern]

speaker: left
text: A camp in central Nolavillia has just been destroyed.

speaker: right
text: Destory them.

speaker: left
text: I will send troops out to surround them.

speaker: left
text: They'll have no escape, this is be far stronger the past battles.

speaker: right
text: It better be.

speaker: right
text: Remember, Omega...

speaker: right
text: If you fail, they will be destroyed.
[Bonus Conversation Unlocked]

speaker: left
text: Lias, I've been thinking about what you've said earlier in the Bipole Sea...

speaker: right
text: Ummm... what did I say?

speaker: left
text: You said that you were surviving in the sea by drinking the sea water.

speaker: left
text: That is true, yes?

speaker: right
text: Yeah.

speaker: left
text: Drinking sea water is extremely dangerous, and I thought you were lying at first.

speaker: left
text: But then I realized you might have some sort of immunity to the pollution inside of the water.

speaker: right
text: Immunity?

speaker: left
text: Yes.

speaker: left
text: When was the last time you've gotten sick?

speaker: right
text: Hmmmm...

speaker: right
text: Now that I think of it, I don't think I've ever gotten sick.

speaker: left
text: you have an absurdly powerful immune system.

speaker: left
text: If we ever encounter an enemy that battles with infections, you might more resistant against them.

speaker: right
text: That's good to know.
[Quest and Lias leveled up!]
